title: MYB
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Samsung Releases Critical Update For Most Galaxy Users
items.description: Install this update as soon as you can — even if it makes your phone unusable for a while.

items.title: Amazon Customers Issued 48 Hour Warning—Attacks Have Started
items.description: Look out for these messages on your phone and check your account settings now.
